name: Pregnant mother game: Pregnant mom babysitting sim
name_original: Pregnant mother game: Pregnant mom babysitting sim
description: Virtual Pregnant Mother Simulator game specially designed for fun. Play pregnant mom babysitting simulator and enjoy as a babysitter and mother both in this single game. A mum and baby game designed for kids & family. Let’s look what’s we find in this awesome virtual 3D game. This games starts from the very beginning, where a mother catches a feel of being a pregnant mommy. She is dreaming of an angle baby, who is an addition in family bringing happiness to everyone family member in the family.
